Class SubscriptionDAOPostgres

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.persist.postgres.SubscriptionDAOPostgres
All Implemented Interfaces:
SubscriptionDAO
public class SubscriptionDAOPostgres extends Object implements SubscriptionDAO
PostgreSQL implementation of the SubscriptionDAO interface. Provides methods for managing subscriptions in the database.

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(int subscriberId, int providerId)
      Subscribes the current user to a subscription offered by another user.
      Specified by:
      subscribe in interface SubscriptionDAO
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the user subscribing.
      providerId - The ID of the user offering the subscription.

    • isSubscribed

      public boolean isSubscribed(int subscriberId, int providerId)
      Checks if a subscription exists between two users.
      Specified by:
      isSubscribed in interface SubscriptionDAO
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
      Returns:
      `true` if the subscription exists, `false` otherwise.

      public void unsubscribe(int subscriberId, int providerId)
      Deletes a subscription between a subscriber and a provider.

      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      providerId - The ID of the provider.
